articles.title: Russia responsible for satellite hack causing chaos across Europe - The Telegraph
articles.description: Cyber attack shut down 5,800 German wind turbines ahead of Ukraine invasion
articles.content:
Russia was behind a cyber attack which caused chaos across Europe hours before it invaded Ukraine, British officials have confirmed.
